Sam Smith’s Debut Album Goes Platinum

posted by Graham on December 15, 2014 in News

Sam Smith’s incredible year continues. With six Grammy nominations already in his pocket, Smith snapped up platinum certification for his debut studio album In The Lonely Hour. By RIAA standards, that means the English crooner has sold at least 1,000,000 copies of the album.

He also just released a new video, got mashed-up with Kanye, and is about to go back on tour. Safe to say Sam Smith will be sorry to see the end of 2014.

“I WANT PEOPLE TO FEEL LIKE THEY’RE READING A DIARY”: SAM SMITH ON “IN THE LONELY HOUR,” UNREQUITED LOVE, AND BEING THE NEXT ADELE
